”Alexa, open school of faith”
”Alexa, ask school of faith for the latest talk”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: school of faith
des: Listen to the latest daily Rosary meditations from Holy Family School of Faith. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
